plugins.name: Component Mapping Kit
plugins.description:
A toolkit for efficiently visualizing and managing components in Figma designs.


Features:

  1. Automatic component detection within frames
  2. Component filtering by name
  3. Customizable overlay colors and sizes
  4. Component name labels
  5. Detailed settings in options panel
plugins.tagline: Efficiently visualizing components in Figma design

plugins.name: RatioRects
plugins.description:
Proportional Rectangle Generator is a Figma plugin designed specifically for designers, aimed at simplifying rectangle creation and sizing processes. Through intelligent proportion calculation and an intuitive interface, it helps designers quickly generate precise and consistent rectangular shapes.


Feature Highlights ✨

Precision Design Tools

🎯 Accurate Proportion Calculation

📐 Diverse Proportion Selections

🔄 Bidirectional Size Inference

📱 Supports Horizontal and Vertical Orientation Switching

Smart Design Assistance

🖌 Real-time Visual Preview

🎨 Intelligent Background Color Adaptation

✂️ Adjustable Selected Shapes

🖥 Rich Preset Proportion Library
plugins.tagline: Generate proportional rectangles with a single click, simplifying size calculations.

plugins.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
plugins.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

1. In-plugin TOC generation

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
plugins.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

128139.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
128139.description:

128139.release_notes: Optimized speed of extracting frames for TOC
128139.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

plugins.name: Round Off
plugins.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
plugins.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

130230.name: Round Off
130230.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
130230.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

plugins.name: Holy Shade
plugins.description:
Holy Shade - A Color Matching Challenge! 🎨


Test your color perception skills with Holy Shade, a fun and engaging game designed for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts! 🖌️


🔍 How to Play:


A target color is displayed at the top.


Choose the matching shade from the options below.


The closer your choice, the higher your score!


💡 Why Play?


Improve your color differentiation skills.


Sharpen your ability to recognize subtle shade variations.


Challenge yourself and compete for the highest score!


Are you ready to master the art of color perception? 🌈✨
plugins.tagline: A Color Matching Challenge!

plugins.name: Export to Denada
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

121997.name: Export to Denada
121997.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
121997.release_notes: Allow exporting any layer, not just Frame layers.
121997.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

plugins.name: Figmata
plugins.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.
plugins.tagline: Data-driven design directly in Figma

130087.name: Figmata
130087.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.

plugins.name: Layout Aware Renaming
plugins.description:
Features

- Auto-Detect Grids: Automatically detects rows and columns in your selection.

- Custom Naming: Add prefixes and choose between numeric or alphabetic suffixes.

- Manual Override: Specify exact rows/columns when auto-detection fails.

- Mixed Sizes: Works with elements of different sizes in the same grid.

- Figma & FigJam: Compatible with both Figma and FigJam (limited support).
plugins.tagline: Automatically rename elements based on their grid layout.

116823.name: Layout Aware Renaming
116823.description:

- Figma & FigJam: Compatible with both Figma and FigJam (limited support).
116823.tagline: Automatically rename elements based on their grid layout.

plugins.name: Maruco
plugins.description:
What is this?

Maruco is a plugin that provides rules and validation for component naming, helping you identify components that violate naming conventions and elements.


1. Selecting naming convention.

There are several conventions, let's select the best one for your project.


2. Entering naming elements.

Next, you can enter "words" that makes up the component's name.

Enter a comma between words to set multiple words.

Maruco guesses that the component's name is made up of three elements: a prefix, a middle word and a suffix.


3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
plugins.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

117124.description:

117124.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Generate stunning charts for data visualization with ease

plugins.name: 打印工具 Figma Print Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

Figma Print Pro is a specialized plugin that helps you create print-ready documents directly in Figma. Easily set up standard or custom page sizes, add bleed areas and crop marks, export high-quality PDFs in multiple color formats, and ensure professional results with built-in DPI checks.


Function Description

  1. Custom & Preset Dimensions: Choose from popular print sizes (A4, A3, B5) or enter exact dimensions.
  2. Bleed & Crop Marks: Add bleed lines and crop marks to prepare for professional trimming.
  3. Multi-page Documents: Generate multi-page print layouts all within a single Figma file.
  4. Color Management: Export PDFs in RGB, CMYK, or grayscale for precise color control.
  5. Adjustable Image Quality: Downsample images and set compression levels to optimize file size.
  6. DPI Checks: Analyze frames to confirm whether resolution meets professional print standards.


Usage

  1. Set Up a Document: In the plugin panel, pick a preset size (A4, A3, B5) or enter your custom width and height.
  2. Adjust Settings: Define bleed margins, enable crop marks, and specify the page count.
  3. Preview: The plugin generates a quick visual preview of each page.
  4. Export to PDF: Choose a color format (RGB, CMYK, or grayscale), select image quality settings, then export.
  5. Check DPI: Run the DPI check tool to ensure images and frames meet print-quality standards.


Tips

  1. Recommended DPI: For most print jobs, 300 DPI is standard. Ensure your images and frames meet or exceed this resolution.
  2. Color Consistency: When using CMYK, note that colors may differ slightly from on-screen previews.
  3. Bleed Setup: If your printer requires a bleed, confirm the exact measurement specifications with your print provider.
  4. Downsampling: Keep an eye on image clarity if you significantly reduce the DPI to minimize file size.


介绍

Figma Print Pro 是一款专为在 Figma 中直接创建印刷文档的插件。它支持自定义或常见的标准纸张尺寸，允许添加出血线和裁切线，支持导出多种颜色格式的高质量 PDF，并可进行 DPI 检查，帮助您轻松获得专业的印刷效果。


功能说明

  1. 自定义与预设尺寸：可使用常见的印刷尺寸（A4、A3、B5）或自行输入宽高。
  2. 出血线与裁切线：可配置出血线并添加裁切线，满足专业印刷需求。
  3. 多页文档：在单个 Figma 文件中快速生成多页的打印版面。
  4. 颜色管理：支持 RGB、CMYK 以及灰度输出，便于精确控制印刷颜色。
  5. 可调节图像质量：支持图像降采样并可设置压缩比，实现更小文件体积。
  6. DPI 检查：可检查 Frame 分辨率，判断是否符合专业印刷要求。


使用方法

  1. 文档设置：在插件面板中，选择 A4、A3、B5 等预设尺寸，或手动输入自定义宽高。
  2. 参数调整：设定出血值、是否添加裁切线，以及需要的页面数量。
  3. 预览页面：插件会生成每页的预览，方便快速查看效果。
  4. 导出 PDF：选择颜色模式（RGB、CMYK 或灰度），根据需求调整图像质量后即可导出。
  5. 检查 DPI：使用 DPI 检查功能，确保图像或 Frame 的分辨率达到了可印刷的标准。


注意事项

  1. 建议 DPI：一般印刷要求 300 DPI，确保图像及画框分辨率符合或高于该标准。
  2. 颜色差异：使用 CMYK 模式时，实际印刷颜色可能与屏幕上显示的略有偏差。
  3. 出血线设置：如印刷厂有特殊要求，请提前确认所需的出血值。
  4. 图像降采样：若大幅降低分辨率以减小文件体积，需注意图像清晰度的影响。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Streamline print creation & DPI checks in Figma

  2. Adjust Settings: Define bleed margins, enable crop marks, and specify the page count.
  3. Preview: The plugin generates a quick visual preview of each page.
  4. Export to PDF: Choose a color format (RGB, CMYK, or grayscale), select image quality settings, then export.
  5. Check DPI: Run the DPI check tool to ensure images and frames meet print-quality standards.


Tips

  1. Recommended DPI: For most print jobs, 300 DPI is standard. Ensure your images and frames meet or exceed this resolution.
  2. Color Consistency: When using CMYK, note that colors may differ slightly from on-screen previews.
  3. Bleed Setup: If your printer requires a bleed, confirm the exact measurement specifications with your print provider.
  4. Downsampling: Keep an eye on image clarity if you significantly reduce the DPI to minimize file size.


介绍

Figma Print Pro 是一款专为在 Figma 中直接创建印刷文档的插件。它支持自定义或常见的标准纸张尺寸，允许添加出血线和裁切线，支持导出多种颜色格式的高质量 PDF，并可进行 DPI 检查，帮助您轻松获得专业的印刷效果。


功能说明

  1. 自定义与预设尺寸：可使用常见的印刷尺寸（A4、A3、B5）或自行输入宽高。
  2. 出血线与裁切线：可配置出血线并添加裁切线，满足专业印刷需求。
  3. 多页文档：在单个 Figma 文件中快速生成多页的打印版面。
  4. 颜色管理：支持 RGB、CMYK 以及灰度输出，便于精确控制印刷颜色。
  5. 可调节图像质量：支持图像降采样并可设置压缩比，实现更小文件体积。
  6. DPI 检查：可检查 Frame 分辨率，判断是否符合专业印刷要求。


使用方法

  1. 文档设置：在插件面板中，选择 A4、A3、B5 等预设尺寸，或手动输入自定义宽高。
  2. 参数调整：设定出血值、是否添加裁切线，以及需要的页面数量。
  3. 预览页面：插件会生成每页的预览，方便快速查看效果。
  4. 导出 PDF：选择颜色模式（RGB、CMYK 或灰度），根据需求调整图像质量后即可导出。
  5. 检查 DPI：使用 DPI 检查功能，确保图像或 Frame 的分辨率达到了可印刷的标准。


注意事项

  1. 建议 DPI：一般印刷要求 300 DPI，确保图像及画框分辨率符合或高于该标准。
  2. 颜色差异：使用 CMYK 模式时，实际印刷颜色可能与屏幕上显示的略有偏差。
  3. 出血线设置：如印刷厂有特殊要求，请提前确认所需的出血值。
  4. 图像降采样：若大幅降低分辨率以减小文件体积，需注意图像清晰度的影响。

manifest.name: 打印工具 Figma Print Pro

137683.tagline: Streamline print creation & DPI checks in Figma

plugins.name: Fair Colors
plugins.description:
Fair Colors is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your color workflow, helping you manage, apply, and audit colors within your designs.


Key Features:


Extract Colors: Quickly grab all unique colors from your current selection, including solid fills and gradients.

Organize Palettes: Create and manage multiple color palettes, giving them custom names for easy organization.

Apply & Replace: Effortlessly apply saved colors to selected layers or replace existing colors throughout your selection.

Smart Highlighting: Instantly highlight all layers in your canvas that use a specific color, making auditing and adjustments a breeze.

Track Changes: Identify and manage color discrepancies by generating a "Fair Colors Changes" frame that visually shows differences between your saved palette and colors found in your selection.

Export Tokenized Colors: Generate a clean, tokenized reference frame of your used colors, perfect for design system documentation or developer handoff.

Fair Color helps you maintain consistency, identify rogue colors, and accelerate your design process by putting powerful color management tools right at your fingertips.
plugins.tagline: Local Color Palette System

plugins.name: Gradientify
plugins.description:
Bring vibrant, layered gradients into your Figma designs. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Generate random gradients with an optional noise effect
  2. Paste CSS code from gradientify.app to apply gradients to layers
  3. Use gradients as fill properties for easy customization


Free trial

Try it out up to 5 times in each mode (random generation and CSS import), or unlock unlimited use with a license key.


Thank you for your support

This plugin was built to complement gradientify.app, a free tool for designing and animating gradients for the web. Buying a license helps keep the project going ❤️


Contact me:

If you have questions or comments, please send me a message to rengifo.eder@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate and paste CSS gradients to layers as fill properties

plugins.name: Fastr Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin can convert a Figma file into a Fastr compatible format. This will generate a .zip file that you can import into Fastr Frontend platform. One quick import is all it takes to transform your Figma files into fully interactive experiences—brand components, fonts, and layouts intact. Get ready to edit, animate, and publish designs faster than ever before.


How to use the plug-in

If you have any issues when using the plugin, we recommend visiting our community article, which has a full guide and FAQs. For more information about the Fastr Frontend platform, please visit our website.


Reporting Issues

For any questions, please email support@getfastr.com and our team can assist further


License


This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

Copyright (c) KALEIDOS INC

The Fastr Exporter was built using the Penpot Exporter.

Penpot and the Penpot exporter plugin are Kaleidos’ open source projects.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Bring Your Figma Designs into Fastr Frontend

plugins.name: Text Flow
plugins.description:
「Text Flow」は、指定したレイヤー名のテキストに用意したテキストを流し込むプラグインです。これで、テキストのコピペ地獄とはサヨナラ！Figmaでのデザイン作業をスピードアップすることができます。


  1. レイヤー名の設定：テキストを入力したいレイヤーに、共通の名前をつけます。
  2. テキストの準備：流し込みたいテキストを、改行で区切って準備します。
  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。
  4. 入力と適用：レイヤー名とテキストを入力して、「適用」ボタンをクリックします。
plugins.tagline: テキスト流し込みを効率化

plugins.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
plugins.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

137384.description:

plugins.name: Font Classifier
plugins.description:
Font Classifier helps designers sort fonts into custom categories like Serif, Display, Branding, and more.

Quickly preview and apply fonts to selected text layers in Figma without digging through the full font list.

No more scrolling through 1000+ alphabetically listed fonts — just categorize your favorites and access them instantly.

Ideal for web, UI, and graphic designers who want faster access to curated typefaces.

Save time, stay consistent, and build your own font system directly in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Organize, preview, and apply fonts by category — faster typography for designers.

plugins.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
plugins.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"
plugins.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!

plugins.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
plugins.description:
1. Select one or more layers in your Figma file (the plugin will find all text layers within your selection).
  2. Open the plugin and enter your OpenAI API key. If you don't have one: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key
  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma text layers with smart, unique AI-generated content.

135957.description:

  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.

plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Figma上のテキストレイヤーをCSVを使って効率的に一括置換・エクスポートできるツールです。

Figmaでのテキスト管理が多いプロジェクトや翻訳ワークフローに最適なプラグインです。


【主な機能】

①テキストの一括置換

CSVファイルにA列＝検索対象、B列＝置換内容を記述し、プラグインに読み込ませるだけで、Figma内の該当テキストを自動的に置き換えます。


②テキストのエクスポート

選択したフレームやテキストレイヤー内の文字列をCSV形式で書き出し。翻訳や編集作業との連携に最適です。


【使い方】

プラグイン起動後、

「リプレイス」タブでCSVファイルをアップロードし置換を実行

「エクスポート」タブでは、選択中のテキストをCSVでダウンロード可能

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----


This plugin allows you to bulk replace and export text layers in Figma using CSV files—perfect for efficient content updates and translation workflows.

Highly useful for localization, bulk edits, or working with external editors.


[Key Features]

①Bulk Replace Text

Simply upload a CSV file where column A = target text and column B = replacement text. The plugin will find and replace matching text layers in your Figma file.


②Export Text

Export text content from selected frames or layers into a CSV file. Ideal for translation or review processes.


[How to Use]

Open the plugin and go to the “Replace” tab to upload your CSV and execute replacement.

Use the “Export” tab to download the text from selected layers as a CSV file.

When a frame is selected, all text layers within that frame will be exported together as a CSV file.
plugins.tagline: Replace and export text layers in Figma via CSV. CSVでテキストを一括置換＆エクスポート。

plugins.name: Content Anonymizer
plugins.description: A Figma plugin that helps anonymize sensitive content in your designs by replacing product names with "Lorem ipsum" text, prices with generic placeholders, and images with neutral content.
plugins.tagline: Anonymize the content in your imported designs

134697.name: Content Anonymizer
134697.description: A Figma plugin that helps anonymize sensitive content in your designs by replacing product names with "Lorem ipsum" text, prices with generic placeholders, and images with neutral content.
134697.tagline: Anonymize the content in your imported designs

plugins.name: Nexus
plugins.description:
Nexus is a Figma plugin designed to seamlessly sync content from Google Sheets while automatically updating text layers and their names.


Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.


✅ Real-time sync with Google Sheets

✅ Automatic update of text layer content

✅ Structured layer renaming (#BODY.x, #CTA.x)

✅ Clean, intuitive interface for efficient workflows


Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

Nexus handles the repetitive work — you focus on creating.
plugins.tagline: Power Your Workflow

136280.description:

plugins.name: Hotkey
plugins.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
plugins.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

135952.name: Hotkey
135952.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
135952.release_notes:
Commands:
1. New Increase/Decrease Width & Height Commands: Use +h, -h, +w, and -w to dynamically adjust height and width values relative to current dimensions.

Other Changes:
1. Added support for + and - prefixes in command parsing (e.g., +h12, -w8) and updated internal regex handling accordingly.
135952.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

plugins.name: LayAuto Plugin
plugins.description:
LayAuto is a responsive SVG layout generator that creates customizable grid-based designs with text and images, perfect for quick visual mockups and design assets.


This Figma plugin imports LayAuto designs by converting the SVG code into accurately positioned Figma elements, while preserving multiline text, shapes, and styling.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly bring LayAuto designs into Figma.

131585.tagline: Seamlessly bring LayAuto designs into Figma.

plugins.name: Project starter
plugins.description:
Automatically sets up your Figma file structure with one click.

It also creates a Cover image component with auto-layout applied, and places it on the first page.


The plugin will create the following pages:

🖼️ Cover

plugins.name: Figma to osu!framework
plugins.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma elements into osu!framework snippets

129799.name: Figma to osu!framework
129799.description:

  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)

plugins.name: SP Grid Table Generator
plugins.description: Quickly generate editable AG Grid-style tables in Figma. Customize column headers and input row data before generating a clean, structured table—complete with filter icons, dividers, and consistent styling. Perfect for dashboards, admin panels, and data-heavy UI mockups.
plugins.tagline: Quickly generate Tables

129011.description: Quickly generate editable AG Grid-style tables in Figma. Customize column headers and input row data before generating a clean, structured table—complete with filter icons, dividers, and consistent styling. Perfect for dashboards, admin panels, and data-heavy UI mockups.

plugins.name: QuickCheck
plugins.description: QuickCheck is a plugin that helps you promptly run a validation on your layout to check how aligned it is with some of the most known foundational guidelines - such as using multiples of 8 and an 8pt grid, and making sure to be consistent on your color choices. Also, QuickCheck make the correction easier, with a two-click process.
plugins.tagline: Layout verification. Consistency check. Select, check, fix.

130380.name: QuickCheck
130380.description: QuickCheck is a plugin that helps you promptly run a validation on your layout to check how aligned it is with some of the most known foundational guidelines - such as using multiples of 8 and an 8pt grid, and making sure to be consistent on your color choices. Also, QuickCheck make the correction easier, with a two-click process.
130380.tagline: Layout verification. Consistency check. Select, check, fix.

plugins.name: prompt2canvas
plugins.description:
prompt2canvas brings powerful AI image generation directly into Figma. Use top models like Flux, SDXL, Imagen, and more—without leaving your design canvas.


Easily customize each model’s settings through a clean and intuitive interface, tailor prompts to your needs, and generate stunning visuals in seconds.


To use the plugin, you’ll need an API key from Replicate, which gives you access to a wide range of state-of-the-art AI models.
plugins.tagline: The power of top AI models, seamlessly integrated into your design workflow.
